feed.title: Okay, time to bring up bitcoin/bitcoin

entry.title: Okay, time to bring up bitcoin/bitcoin
entry.summary: In this email thread, Laszlo Hanyecz shared a link to an article about a nursing website, which he believed may have been accidentally linked by someone with a similar username to the person who posted a suspicious link to a phishing site. Kevin, the original poster of the phishing link, defended his project and argued that it was a serious bitcoin project. However, there were doubts about the legitimacy of the link, and concerns were raised about Kevin's use of Autoit scripting language. Ultimately, Kevin acknowledged that the link wasn't working properly and that he needed to register a domain for his project. He assured the group that he would never set up a phishing link and hoped they could move on to discussing bitcoin.
